author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
As discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33012, the L1Reco step is obsolete for Phase-2. It is an unclear point if we should rerun `L1TrackTrigger,L1` again in RECO or not. This to be clarify.

#### PR validation:
None

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
No need of backport.
title: Remove L1Reco from Phase2 workflow
